kr.neolab.sdk.pen

Interface IPenCtrl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PenCtrl

    public interface IPenCtrl
    The interface that provides the functionality of a pen

      • upgradePen

        void upgradePen(java.io.File fwFile,
                java.lang.String targetPath)
         throws ProtocolNotSupportedException
        Deprecated. upgradePen(File fwFile, String targetPath) is replaced by upgradePen2( File fwFile, String fwVersion ) in the protocol 2.0
        To upgrade the firmware of the pen.
        Parameters:
        fwFile - the fw file
        targetPath - The file path to be stored in the pen
        Throws:
        ProtocolNotSupportedException - the protocol not supported exception

      • upgradePen

        To upgrade the firmware of the pen.
        Parameters:
        fwFile - object of firmware
        Throws:
        ProtocolNotSupportedException - the protocol not supported exception

          throws ProtocolNotSupportedException

        Parameters:
        fwFile - the fw file
        fwVersion - the fw version

        fwVersion - the fw version

      • reqOfflineData

        void reqOfflineData(int sectionId,
                    int ownerId,
                    int noteId)
        The pen is stored in an offline transfer of data requested. (Please note that this function is not synchronized. If multiple threads concurrently try to run this function, explicit synchronization must be done externally.)
        Parameters:
        sectionId - section id of note
        ownerId - owner id of note
        noteId - of note

      • reqOfflineData

        void reqOfflineData(int sectionId,
                    int ownerId,
                    int noteId,
                    boolean deleteOnFinished)
             throws ProtocolNotSupportedException
        The pen is stored in an offline transfer of data requested. (Please note that this function is not synchronized. If multiple threads concurrently try to run this function, explicit synchronization must be done externally.)
        Parameters:
        sectionId - section id of note
        ownerId - owner id of note
        noteId - of note
        deleteOnFinished - delete offline data when transmission is finished
        Throws:
        ProtocolNotSupportedException - the protocol not supported exception

      • reqSetupPenSensitivityFSC

        void reqSetupPenSensitivityFSC(short level)
                        throws ProtocolNotSupportedException
        Notice!! This is API for hardware developer! Software developers should never use this API.

        Setup Sensitivity level of pen using FSC press sensor

        supported from Protocol 2.0

        Parameters:
        level - sensitivity level (0~4)
        Throws:
        ProtocolNotSupportedException - the protocol not supported exception
